name: Vengeance on the Northspring
tooltip:
Vengeance on the Northspring

Talo Thornhoof wants you to kill 4 Northspring Harpies, 4 Northspring Roguefeathers, 4 Northspring Windcallers, and 4 Northspring Slayers.

Requirements:
- Northspring Harpy x 4
- Northspring Roguefeather x 4
- Northspring Slayer x 4
- Northspring Windcaller x 4
